metadata.title: CVE-2020-27818 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the check_chunk_name() function of pngcheck-2.4.0. Anattacker able to pass a malicious file to be processed by pngcheck couldcause a temporary denial of service, posing a low risk to applicationavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pngcheck - 2.3.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pngcheck package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1').
